reviewText: really didn't care for it.  not that arousing to view
I ordred two of these girls gone wild videos thinking that it is was the usual, but I got censored copies.
This isn't just flashing. This is full on girl on girl sex, and it's a pretty decent video.

It says this on the back of the box."In this brand new DVD we are going to bring you a set of new girls that will take it to another level. These aren't your typical GGW girls". After reading that and harboring hopes that I'm going to see something new it turns out that the first three solo segments are the same I've seen in other GGW DVDs. They also state on the cover, "G/G aaction caught on camera". There is never two girls in any scene. Makes you realize that they are doing to you what the girls are doing to themselves. Now, to the film. If you like girl solo action this is your baby. There are six segments with the girls going the limit in five of them. The sixth girl "shaves" herself with barbers clippersand it ends there. The other five scenes are good and I really liked the third one where the girl takes the camera man to her room and on the bed shows how she does it. Then she stands on the bed with her back to the head board and torments her self standing with the camera low and shooting straight up. Some very erotic moments there. Behind the girl on the wall above the headboard is a large picture covered by a white towel. If you've seen this segment before you'll remember it from that. For girl solo action this would rank high on GGWs lists. There is practilly no flashing in this one. The film runs for about one hour and fifteen minutes so you are not getting shortchanged. With all the reruns we are getting now they must have stopped filming and getting all their subject matter from their archives. I can't see paying for the same scenes over and over so I'm going to stop buying for a while and wait until they get to see if they get new  material.

One ot their better DVDs if you like mostly Girl solos  and Girl/Girl action. Practicalally no flashing,dancing or butt wiggling. There are 5 sequences and the film plays for 1 hr 20 min. The first three I've seen on other GGW DVDs which sort of belies the Secret tapes title. Any way the first has a girl showing well she can squirt. Cute girl and good looking body. She can squirt real well. They even talked her into a repeat performance. I didn't think she'd have any left to do it again but she fooled me. Real good show except for her damned insane giggle. Second comes a G/G scene. They do all the things they should and seem to really enjoy themselves. Third scene is a solo which is done right but she never really connected with me the first time. She still doesn't. Forth segment improves with a girl soloing with a plastic,ivory, knobby vibrator. She works it good for a while and then adds a finger sized purple dildo about ten inches long and right away you know where thats going and after a few minutes thats where it goes. Thats a turn off for me but  what the hell, different strokes for different folks. Any way in the end she gets herself off using the vibrator where it should be used and all's well that ends well. The best for last, this girl 18 and nice uses a ten inch black rubber dildo and burys that thing flush when she gets off. A good DVD and at an hour and twenty minutes run time well worth the price.
